channel.title: New Features & Releases on
channel.description: Recent content in New Features & Releases on

item.title: SeaChat Release History
item.description: 08/21/2025 # New Features & Improvements # Added auto-hangup configuration for SeaX calls integration Fixed bugs in html embedded widget code Updated auto-timeout transfer: now it switches back to the AI agent based on the last human activity, instead of only when the last message was sent by the user 08/15/2025 # New Features & Improvements # Fixed a bug where error messages appeared when conversing with the AI agent while the custom GPT tool was enabled.
